verses.verse: Then <S%G2532><s%> the Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of the scribes <S%G1122><s%> gathered together <S%G4863><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> having come <S%G2064><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%>

Now <S%G2532><s%> when they saw <S%G1492><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G3101><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> eating <S%G2068><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> with <S%G5495><s%> defiled, <S%G2839><s%> that <S%G5124><s%> is, <S%G2076><s%> unwashed, <S%G449><s%> hands, <S%G5495><s%> they found fault. <S%G3201><s%>

(For <S%G1063><s%> the Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> don't <S%G2068><s%> eat unless <S%G1437><s%> they wash <S%G3538><s%> their hands <S%G5495><s%> and forearms, <S%G4435><s%> holding <S%G2902><s%> to the tradition <S%G3862><s%> of the elders. <S%G4245><s%>

They <S%G2532><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> when they come from <S%G575><s%> the marketplace, <S%G58><s%> unless <S%G3362><s%> <S%G3361><s%> they bathe <S%G907><s%> themselves, <S%G2532><s%> and there are <S%G2076><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> other things, <S%G243><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they have received <S%G3880><s%> to hold <S%G2902><s%> to: <S%G909><s%> washings of cups, <S%G4221><s%> <S%G2532><s%> pitchers, <S%G3582><s%> <S%G2532><s%> bronze vessels, <S%G5473><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> couches. <S%G2825><s%>)

The <S%G1899><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him, <S%G1223><s%> "Why <S%G5101><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the tradition <S%G3862><s%> of the elders, <S%G4245><s%> but <S%G235><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> their bread <S%G740><s%> with <S%G5495><s%> unwashed <S%G449><s%> hands? <S%G5495><s%>"

He <S%G1161><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, <S%G3754><s%> "Well <S%G2573><s%> did <S%G4395><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> prophesy <S%G4395><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> <S%G3778><s%> 'This people <S%G2992><s%> honors <S%G5091><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> with <S%G5491><s%> their lips, <S%G5491><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> their <S%G846><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> is <S%G568><s%> far <S%G4206><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me. <S%G1700><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> in vain <S%G3155><s%> do they worship <S%G4576><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> as doctrines <S%G1319><s%> the commandments <S%G1778><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>'

"For <S%G1063><s%> you set aside <S%G863><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and hold <S%G2902><s%> tightly to the tradition <S%G3862><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>â€” the washing <S%G909><s%> of pitchers <S%G3582><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cups, <S%G4221><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you do <S%G4160><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> other <S%G243><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> things. <S%G3946><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Full well <S%G2573><s%> do you reject <S%G114><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you may keep <S%G5083><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> tradition. <S%G3862><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5091><s%> 'Honor your <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> mother; <S%G3384><s%>' and, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2551><s%> 'He who speaks evil of father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%> let him be put <S%G5053><s%> to death. <S%G5053><s%>'

But <S%G1161><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G1437><s%> 'If a man <S%G444><s%> tells <S%G2036><s%> his father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his mother, <S%G3384><s%> "Whatever <S%G1437><s%> profit <S%G5623><s%> you might have received <S%G1537><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> is Corban, <S%G2878><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> is to say, <S%G2076><s%> given to God; <S%G1435><s%>"'

then <S%G2532><s%> you no longer <S%G3765><s%> allow <S%G863><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> anything <S%G3762><s%> for <S%G3962><s%> his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%>

making <S%G208><s%> void <S%G208><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> by your <S%G5216><s%> tradition, <S%G3862><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you have handed <S%G3860><s%> down. <S%G2532><s%> You do <S%G4160><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> things <S%G3946><s%> like this. <S%G4160><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> to himself, <S%G3004><s%> and said to them, <S%G846><s%> "Hear <S%G191><s%> me, <S%G3450><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> of you, <S%G2532><s%> and understand. <S%G4920><s%>

There is <S%G2076><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> from outside <S%G1855><s%> of the man, <S%G444><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> going <S%G1531><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> him; <S%G846><s%> but <S%G235><s%> the things which proceed out <S%G1607><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the man <S%G846><s%> are those <S%G1565><s%> that <S%G2076><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> the man. <S%G444><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear, <S%G191><s%> let him hear! <S%G191><s%>"

When <S%G3753><s%> he had entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a house <S%G3624><s%> away from <S%G575><s%> the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him <S%G846><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the parable. <S%G3850><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Are <S%G2075><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> thus <S%G3779><s%> without understanding <S%G801><s%> also? <S%G2532><s%> Don't <S%G3756><s%> you <S%G3539><s%> perceive <S%G3539><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> whatever <S%G3956><s%> goes <S%G1531><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the man <S%G444><s%> from outside <S%G1855><s%> <S%G1410><s%> can't <S%G3756><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> him, <S%G846><s%>

because <S%G3754><s%> it doesn't <S%G3756><s%> go <S%G1531><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> heart, <S%G2588><s%> but <S%G235><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his stomach, <S%G2836><s%> then <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the latrine, <S%G856><s%> thus purifying <S%G2511><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> foods? <S%G1033><s%>"
He said, <S%G3754><s%> "That which proceeds out <S%G1607><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the man, <S%G444><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> defiles <S%G2840><s%> the man. <S%G444><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> from within, <S%G2081><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the hearts <S%G2588><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> proceed <S%G1607><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> thoughts, <S%G1261><s%> adulteries, <S%G3430><s%> sexual sins, <S%G4202><s%> murders, <S%G5408><s%> thefts, <S%G2829><s%>

covetings, <S%G4124><s%> wickedness, <S%G4189><s%> deceit, <S%G1388><s%> lustful desires, <S%G766><s%> an <S%G3788><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> eye, <S%G3788><s%> blasphemy, <S%G988><s%> pride, <S%G5243><s%> and foolishness. <S%G877><s%>
All <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> evil things <S%G4190><s%> come <S%G1607><s%> from within, <S%G2081><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> the man. <S%G444><s%>"

From <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G1564><s%> he arose, <S%G450><s%> and went <S%G565><s%> away into <S%G1519><s%> the borders <S%G3181><s%> of Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sidon. <S%G4605><s%> He <S%G2532><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a house, <S%G3614><s%> and didn't <S%G2309><s%> want anyone <S%G3762><s%> to know <S%G1097><s%> it, <S%G2532><s%> but he <S%G1410><s%> couldn't <S%G3756><s%> escape notice. <S%G2990><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> a <S%G1135><s%> woman, <S%G1135><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> little daughter <S%G2365><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> an <S%G4151><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and fell <S%G4363><s%> down at <S%G4314><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet. <S%G4228><s%>

Now the woman <S%G1135><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> a Greek, <S%G1674><s%> a Syrophoenician <S%G4949><s%> by race. <S%G1085><s%> She <S%G2532><s%> begged <S%G2065><s%> him <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he would cast <S%G1544><s%> the demon <S%G1140><s%> out <S%G1544><s%> of <S%G2364><s%> her <S%G846><s%> daughter. <S%G2364><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to her, <S%G846><s%> "Let <S%G863><s%> the children <S%G5043><s%> be filled <S%G5526><s%> first, <S%G4412><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> appropriate <S%G2570><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> the children <S%G5043><s%>'s bread <S%G740><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> throw <S%G906><s%> it to the dogs. <S%G2952><s%>"

But <S%G1161><s%> she answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Yes, <S%G3483><s%> Lord. <S%G2532><s%> Yet <S%G1063><s%> even the dogs <S%G2952><s%> under <S%G5270><s%> the table <S%G5132><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> the <S%G575><s%> children <S%G3813><s%>'s crumbs. <S%G5589><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to her, <S%G846><s%> "For <S%G1223><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> saying, <S%G3056><s%> go your way. <S%G5217><s%> The demon <S%G1140><s%> has gone out <S%G1831><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> daughter. <S%G2364><s%>"

She <S%G2532><s%> went <S%G565><s%> away to <S%G1519><s%> her <S%G846><s%> house, <S%G3624><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> the child <S%G2364><s%> having been laid <S%G906><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the bed, <S%G2825><s%> with the demon <S%G1140><s%> gone out. <S%G1831><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> he departed <S%G1831><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the borders <S%G3725><s%> of Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sidon, <S%G4605><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> through <S%G303><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the region <S%G3725><s%> of Decapolis. <S%G1179><s%>

They <S%G2532><s%> brought <S%G5342><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> one who was deaf <S%G2974><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> had an impediment in his speech. <S%G3424><s%> They begged <S%G3870><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> lay <S%G2007><s%> his hand <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G2007><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> took <S%G618><s%> him <S%G846><s%> aside <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> privately, <S%G906><s%> and put his <S%G846><s%> fingers <S%G1147><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> ears, <S%G3775><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he spat, <S%G4429><s%> and touched <S%G680><s%> his <S%G846><s%> tongue. <S%G1100><s%>

Looking <S%G2532><s%> up <S%G308><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> he sighed, <S%G4727><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Ephphatha! <S%G2188><s%>" that <S%G3739><s%> is, <S%G2076><s%> "Be opened! <S%G1272><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> his <S%G846><s%> ears <S%G189><s%> were opened, <S%G1272><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the impediment <S%G1199><s%> of <S%G1100><s%> his <S%G846><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%> was released, <S%G3089><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he spoke <S%G2980><s%> clearly. <S%G3723><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> commanded <S%G1291><s%> them <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should tell <S%G2036><s%> no one, <S%G3367><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> the more <S%G3745><s%> he <S%G846><s%> commanded <S%G1291><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> so much the more <S%G3123><s%> widely <S%G4054><s%> they proclaimed it. <S%G2784><s%>

They <S%G2532><s%> were <S%G1605><s%> astonished <S%G1605><s%> beyond measure, <S%G5249><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "He has done <S%G4160><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> well. <S%G2573><s%> He makes <S%G4160><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the deaf <S%G2974><s%> hear, <S%G191><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the mute <S%G216><s%> speak! <S%G2980><s%>"
